snippet: Dan Duquette is nearing the end of his first season as the Baltimore Orioles' executive vice president for baseball operations, and his first team has been better than any rational person could have expected.
abstract: Dan Duquette is nearing the end of his first season as the Baltimore Orioles' executive vice president for baseball operations, and his first team has been better than any rational person could have expected.

headline.main: Duquette and Orioles Back in the Game
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Duquette and Orioles Back in the Game
